name: Ping Pong Space Zero
description:
Proxdz bring to you the experience of ping pong to android 
Ping pong space zero is a game provide you with the real experience  that you need
Ping pong space zero built with a small size so its won,t take a big space in your phone
and we focus on make this game works in all devices in high performance so you won't face any lags or FC
ping pong games is a one of the most popular android arcade games and one of the most funny games 
To Play this Classic ping pong game , you just have 
to move the bottom bar to the left or to the right.
by moving your finger to the left or right
